column1: WHO has accepted the recommendation from the Solidarity Trial’s International Steering
Committee to discontinue the trial’s hydroxychloroquine and lopinavir/ritonavir treatment
WHO Regional Director for the Western Pacific, Dr Takeshi Kasai spoke of a ‘new normal’, one
that improves both health and livelihoods during a virtual press conference with the World
Economic Forum on COVID-19. He added “This ‘new future’ is the dividend of COVID-19 which
The Regional Office for the Americas/PAHO has launched a new site for donations to its
COVID-19 Response Fund. The resources will help PAHO support countries and territories
throughout the Americas. More details available here.
The Regional Office for Europe is launching a new podcast service entitled: Health in
Europe. WHO works with thousands of inspiring individuals and groups, and this podcast series
highlights their stories and how they might impact your day-to-day life.
